name: Brand New Tshirt Charity "Panda"
description:
Brand new handmade t shirt designed by us named "I forgot how to panda". 10% of the money, that is generated from the sales of this t-shirt will be donated to the World Wildlife Fund (WWF) http://worldwildlife.org/ they do a lot of great work for panda's and all animals in general.

Size Chart
S= Chest 100cm/39.4inches
M= Chest 105cm/41.4inches
L= Chest 110cm/41.4inches
XL= Chest 115cm/45.3inches
XXL= Chest 120cm/47.3inches

Each t-shirt is made by hand by us, we take a huge amount of care in making every piece. We also only produce a small quantity of each design, this assures you that you're not going to go to a party and find another 10 people wearing the same shirt as you!

Quality is a must, we stand behind our products, as such we offer a money back guarantee on any item you purchase with SchrodingerApparel if there are any defects with the product.

Printed on brand new cotton t-shirts. Other colors are now available upon request, just message us after purchasing as, depending on the color, may take extra time to order in the specific color(2-5 days).

International postage is sent through express, estimated 3-7 working days delivery.

*please contact us about bulk order prices.

name: Brand New Tshirt "BusinessMan"
description:
This is an original, one of kind illustration. 'The Businessman' is a character created by us. This is one of a kind design. I think its something we can all relate to, making a mad dash late into work to a job we'd rather not be going to in the first place.

name: Relax
description:
Transcend into an altered mind-state of relaxation.

This is a Brand New Handmade t-shirt print, it was designed by us and given the name 'Relax'. Originally designed as part of a class project, it has been adapted for t-shirts. Great for a gift, or for yourself.
